data.name: VEGA Conflict - Hellfire Pack (Discounted)
data.detailed_description:
Make the ultimate mark in the galaxy with the Hellfire Pack! It contains:

Hellfire Battleship (x5) - This high performing hull will obliterate opposing ships at a shockwave pace.

15,000 Coins - Providing you with the ability to build upon your base assets with the latest tech and resources. Bonus Gold will really help you make your mark in the sector.

Bonus consumable equipment credits to revamp your Hellfire Battleship:

- Volatile Fuel III (x5)
- Fusion Thrusters III (x5)
- Vector Torpedo II (x35)
- Zynthium IV (x5)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP+
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.8GHz, SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible with OS

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.8GHz, SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible with OS
